## Data

```{r}
#| echo: false
library(DT)

# Load dealership inventory data
dealer_url <- "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/jhelvy/vehicletrends@main/data/p_one_powertrain_vehicle_type.csv"
dealer_data <- read.csv(dealer_url)

# Display data table
datatable(
  dealer_data,
  options = list(
    pageLength = 10,
    scrollX = TRUE,
    dom = 'Bfrtip',
    buttons = c('copy', 'csv', 'excel')
  ),
  caption = "Dealership Inventory Patterns by Powertrain and Vehicle Type"
)
```

:::
